metadata.name: Potential SquiblyTwo Technique Execution
metadata.comment: Detects potential SquiblyTwo attack technique with possible renamed WMIC via Imphash and OriginalFileName fields

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmic.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=1b1a3f43bf37b5bfe60751f2ee2f326e')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=37777a96245a3c74eb217308f3546f4c')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=9d87c9d67ce724033c0b40cc4ca1b206'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('format:')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')))

output.summary: Detects potential SquiblyTwo attack technique with possible renamed WMIC via Imphash and OriginalFileName fields
